feed.title: Authentik Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.8.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.8#fixed-in-202482

What's Changed

  • core: ensure proxy provider is correctly looked up (cherry-pick #11267) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11269
  • root: fix ensure outpost_connection_discovery runs on worker startup (cherry-pick #11260) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11270
  • core: ensure all providers have correct priority (cherry-pick #11280) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11281
  • events: optimise marking events as seen (cherry-pick #11297) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11299
  • web/admin: fix notification property mapping forms (cherry-pick #11298) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11300
  • core: fix permission check for scoped impersonation (cherry-pick #11315) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11316
  • enterprise: show specific error if Install ID is invalid in license (cherry-pick #11317) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11319
  • sources/ldap: fix missing search attribute (cherry-pick #11125) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11340
  • enterprise: fix API mixin license validity check (cherry-pick #11331) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11342
  • providers/proxy: fix URL path getting lost when partial URL is given to rd= (cherry-pick #11354) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11355

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.8.1...version/2024.8.2

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.6.5

See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.6#fixed-in-202465

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.8.3
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.8#fixed-in-202483

What's Changed

  • events: always use expiry from current tenant for events, not only when creating from HTTP request (cherry-pick #11415) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11416
  • providers/proxy: fix traefik label generation (cherry-pick #11460) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11480
  • web/admin: fix Authentication flow being required (cherry-pick #11496) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11497
  • sources/ldap: fix mapping check, fix debug endpoint (cherry-pick #11442) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11498
  • sources/ldap: fix ms_ad userAccountControl not checking for lockout (cherry-pick #11532) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11534
  • security: fix CVE-2024-47077 (cherry-pick #11535) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11537
  • security: fix CVE-2024-47070 (cherry-pick #11536) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11539

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.8.2...version/2024.8.3

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.10.0
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.10

What's Changed

  • website/docs: Update social-logins github (cherry-pick #11822) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11836
  • website/docs: remove ï¿½ (cherry-pick #11823) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11835
  • website: 2024.10 Release Notes (cherry-pick #11839) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11840
  • sources/kerberos: add kiprop to ignored system principals (cherry-pick #11852) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11853
  • web/admin: fix code-based MFA toggle not working in wizard (cherry-pick #11854) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11855
  • root: bumpversion 2024.10 by @gergosimonyi in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.10.0-rc1...version/2024.10.0

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.8.4
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.8#fixed-in-202484

What's Changed

  • internal: restore /ping behaviour for embedded outpost (cherry-pick #11568) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11570
  • core: fix permission check for scoped impersonation (cherry-pick #11603) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11650
  • blueprints: fix validation error when using internal storage (cherry-pick #11654) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11656
  • providers/saml: fix incorrect ds:Reference URI (cherry-pick #11699) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11701
  • providers/oauth2: don't overwrite attributes when updating service acccount (cherry-pick #11709) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11723
  • web/admin: fix invalid create date shown for MFA registered before date was saved (cherry-pick #11728) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11729
  • policies/event_matcher: fix inconsistent behaviour (cherry-pick #11724) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11726
  • web/admin: fix sync single button throwing error (cherry-pick #11727) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11730
  • providers/scim: add comparison with existing group on update and delta update users (cherry-pick #11414) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11796
  • providers/scim: clamp batch size for patch requests (cherry-pick #11797) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11802
  • providers/scim: handle no members in group in consistency check (cherry-pick #11801) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/11812

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.8.3...version/2024.8.4
